reviewText:
This feature is only 30 minutes long.  There are several plot points that I would have loved to have seen explored, but there just wasn't enough time in what they produced, so they fortunately did not try to cram it all in.

The transfer is a little washed-out, but clean, and the lip-sync is off by a fraction of a second, so it is watchable, but occasionally you notice.

Now, the action:  VERY nice!  This is one of the best hentai I've seen in a long time, and not much time passes between sex scenes.  What does pass simply serves wonderfully to set up the next ones.  There is bondage, rape (fantasy), female and male masturbation, sex, dominance, submission, and near-incest.  I say "near-" because no one in this feature is actually related; they are all a foster family, which makes the sex that much dirtier while at the same time being that much more acceptable.

Sadly, it is over all too quickly, and that is the only reason I give this only 4 stars instead of 5.  There are two young ladies in it I wanted to see Keichi actually get with (one he had in the opening fantasy scene), and it's hinted that he will, but not on this DVD.

Still, a good hentai, and worth owning!

Keiichi Hayama always dreamed about hot sex with his childhood sweetheart, bBut one day she transformed in his dream to a mysterious beauty with perfect breasts and a seductive eye. The next afternoon, Keiichi came back from school to find that very same woman masturbating in his room!

His mother introduces her as Reika. Since her parents died in a car accident, Reika has been taken in by Keiichi's family. But Keiichi knows there's some dark truth behind this woman, and he has a hunch his prophetic dream wasn't a dream at all.

Spoken Languages: English, Japanese, English subtitles.
